targets.query: SELECT sum("bytes_server") FROM "tcp_timeslice_summary_server_ip" WHERE $timeFilter  AND ("ip" =~ /^10.51.10.182$/) GROUP BY time($interval), "ip" fill(none)
SELECT sum("bytes_server") FROM "tcp_timeslice_summary_client_ip" WHERE $timeFilter  AND ("ip" =~ /^10.51.10.182$/) GROUP BY time($interval), "ip" fill(none)
SELECT sum("bytes_server") FROM "tcp_timeslice_4_tuple" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("client_ip" =~ /^$10.51.10.182$/ OR "server_ip" =~ /^$10.51.10.182$/) GROUP BY time($interval), "ip" fill(none)
SELECT sum("bytes_server") FROM "tcp_open_4_tuple" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("client_ip" =~ /^$10.51.10.182$/ OR "server_ip" =~ /^$10.51.10.182$/) GROUP BY time($interval), "ip" fill(none)
SELECT sum("bytes_server") FROM "tcp_timeslice_4_tuple" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("client_ip" =~ /^$10.51.10.182$/ OR "server_ip" =~ /^$10.51.10.182$/) GROUP BY "ip" fill(none)
SELECT sum("bytes_server") FROM "tcp_open_4_tuple" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("client_ip" =~ /^$10.51.10.182$/ OR "server_ip" =~ /^$10.51.10.182$/) GROUP BY "ip" fill(none)
